button.learnMore.description: Text on button to learn more about the service.

button.apply.description: Text on button to apply for the service.

button.introduction.description: Text on button to view service introduction.

button.apis.description: Text on button to view API description.

button.pricing.description: Text on button to view pricing information.

field.apis.description: API of the service, API is a form of online service.

field.proxies.description: Proxies of the service, proxies are a form of online service used for data transmission as HTTP proxies.

message.free.description: Text displayed when the service is free, indicating the service is free.

message.around.description: Text displayed when the price is approximately around a specific value.

message.welcomeCredits.description: Text displayed when the service offers free welcome credits.

message.appliedCount.description: Text displayed when calculating the number of applications.

message.indexTitle.message: Your Wise Choice for Digital Services

message.indexSubtitle.message: Empowering your work and life with exceptional standards of service.

message.packages.message: We offer points for various packages, the more packages you buy, the more discounts you get.
message.packages.description: Text displayed when the service offers points packages.

message.offer.description: Text displayed when the service offers a promotion.

title.apis.description: API of the service, API is a form of online service.

title.proxies.description: Proxies of the service, proxies are a form of online service used for data transmission as HTTP proxies.

title.packages.description: Packages of the service, packages are used to purchase points, for example, the service offers 3 packages, $100 for 100 points, $200 for 200 points, $300 for 300 points.

unit.credit.description: Credit is the virtual currency used in API services.

unit.Credit.description: Credit is the virtual currency used in API services, in uppercase form.

unit.credits.description: Credits are the virtual currency used in API services, in plural form.

unit.Credits.description: Credits are the virtual currency used in API services, in uppercase and plural form.

unit.call.description: Call is the number of times the API service is called.

unit.Call.description: Call is the number of times the API service is called, in uppercase form.

unit.calls.description: Calls are the number of times the API service is called, in plural form.

unit.Calls.description: Calls are the number of times the API service is called, in uppercase and plural form.

unit.MB.description: MB stands for megabyte, a unit of digital information storage.

unit.GB.description: GB stands for gigabyte, a unit of digital information storage.
